Sentencas: Production costs of two types of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) were estimated to clarify their economical prospects.
Titulo: PRODUCTION COST ESTIMATION OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: In this assessment 2000 kW of SOFC capacity is assumed to be manufactured per month.
Titulo: PRODUCTION COST ESTIMATION OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: Single cells of a planar type with 0.21 W/cm2 are fabricated by co-firing of doctor blade layers and the separators are prepared by firing of press-moulding bodies.
Titulo: PRODUCTION COST ESTIMATION OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: Stacks with 400 W consists of 20 cells and 21 separators.
Titulo: PRODUCTION COST ESTIMATION OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: The materials cost of this type covers nearly 60% of the total (118 000 yen/kW).
Titulo: PRODUCTION COST ESTIMATION OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: By comparison, the tubular SOFCs with 0.18 W/cm2 are assumed to be made using an electrochemical vapour deposition (EVD) method or a plasma spraying (PS) method on porous support tubes.
Titulo: PRODUCTION COST ESTIMATION OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: The module with 20 tubes is built up by arranging the cells in a suitable order.
Titulo: PRODUCTION COST ESTIMATION OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: The support tube is fired after continuous isostatic pressing.
Titulo: PRODUCTION COST ESTIMATION OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: Including the cost of support tubes, the overall costs for tubular cell systems by the EVD method and by the PS method are about 617 000 yen/kW and 293 000 yen/kW, respectively.
Titulo: PRODUCTION COST ESTIMATION OF SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS
